definitions.body: cedar-tree, (a) as growing Nu 24:6, Ps 148:9, Is 41:19, Is 44:14 cf. Ez Eze 31:8; esp. as growing on Lebanon 1Ki 5:13, 2Ki 14:9 = 2Ch 25:18 (both in fable of Jehoash); oft. [[לְּבָנוֹן]] ([[הַ]])[[אַרְזֵי ]] Ju Jdg 9:15, Is 2:13, Is 14:8, Ps 29:5, Ps 29:5 (fig.) Ps 104:16, cf. 1Ki 5:20, 2Ki 19:23 = Is 37:24, Ps 92:13, Ct So 5:15, Ez Eze 27:5 (sg. coll.) Zec 11:1, Zec 11:2 (fig.); Ct So 1:17, Ezr 3:7, Je 22:23 (fig.) Ez Eze 17:3 (fig.); (b) esp. in sim., of outward power, stateliness & majesty Ps 80:11 ([[אֵל]] ´[[א]]) cf. Ez Eze 31:3 (personif., but v. Co on text), Am 2:9; of individuals Je 22:7, Ps 92:13, Ez Eze 17:22, Eze 17:23; cf. other exx. of fig. use, supr.; sim. of straightness & strength Job 40:17 (tail of hippopotamus).
cedar-wood used in purifications, c. [[עֵץ]] Le 14:4, Le 14:6, Le 14:49, Le 14:51, Le 14:52, Nu 19:6 (all P).
